glsa.title: BURP: Root privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability was discovered in Gentoo's ebuild for BURP which could lead to root privilege escalation.

background.p: A network backup and restore program.

description.p: It was discovered that Gentooâ€™s BURP ebuild does not properly set permissions or place the pid file in a safe directory. Additionally, the first set of patches did not completely address this. As such, a revision has been made available that addresses all concerns of the initial report.

impact.p: A local attacker could escalate privileges.

workaround.p: Users should ensure the proper permissions are set as discussed in the referenced bugs.
